game.name: AFK Chess - Chess Auto Battler
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A PvP chess auto battler! Strategically build your army, use tactics to position your pieces and then watch them fight against your opponents! Can you assemble the strongest force?
game.shortDescriptionEn: A PvP chess auto battler! Strategically build your army, use tactics to position your pieces and then watch them fight against your opponents! Can you assemble the strongest force?
